page.title: 08EDUCATION IN SANDY
page.content: SANDY AND THE SURROUNDING AREAS ARE WELL CATERED FOR WITH REGARD TO STATE EDUCATION. ALL THE SCHOOLS IN THE TOWN ARE RUN BY THE BEDFORDSHIRE EDUCATION AUTHORITY WHICH HAS STRUCTURED ITS SCHOOLS INTO THREE TIERS CATERING FOR CHILDREN FROM THE AGE OF FIVE UNTIL EIGHTEEN. THREE LOWER SCHOOLS, ST SWITHUNS, LABERNHAM ROAD AND ROBERT PEEL CATER FOR CHILDREN AGED BETWEEN 5 AND 9. THERE IS ONE MIDDLE SCHOOL, SANDYE PLACE WHICH CATERS FOR THE 9-13 YEAR OLDS, AND SANDY UPPER SCHOOL WHICH TAKES PUPILS AGED 13-18. SANDY UPPER SCHOOL OFFERS A FULL RANGE OF CSE; O LEVEL GCE AND A-LEVELGCE COURSES. ADULT EDUCATION COURSES ARE AVAILABLE AT THE UPPER SCHOOL, WHICH ALSO SERVES AS A COMMUNITY CENTRE. IN ADDITION THERE ARE SEVERAL PRE-SCHOOL PLAYGROUPS IN THE AREA.
